data.message:
I could support eminem better if that picture wouldn't stare in my face.. What happen Marshall?? You are not a Christian any longer? Can you be a legend with good intentions. Your look scares me please consider to change you picture! Thank you!  Uli 
PS I like to ask for your support in fighting cancer..

replies.message: LOL. Wow...perhaps you shouldn't push YOUR religion and opinions on people who you don't even know, and who don't know you. Pure ignorance.

Ok groopy - gold digger I can tell you are just a follower and not strong enough to vocalize opinion in a cultured and civilized manner. Maybe you should be an activist to help people before you throw ignorance around.

What. It is opinion sake that's all  I love God, saw him wearing a cross, and wish eminem would use positive encouragement as an idol.. It takes bringing it up! It's not ignorance.? Would you and Christina be offended if I tell you I love you? Who knows but people need to hear that every day to stay strong and an angel is always a good picture. Wonder what impression the other has
